messages.content: What is the learning objective of this lesson?
To learn about generating an SBOM with reachable evidence for Dependency-Track, a Java application.
What are the prerequisites for this lesson?
Java >= 21, Maven, and Node.js > 20 must be installed.
Run the command sudo npm install -g @cyclonedx/cdxgen.
How do I clone and compile Dependency-Track?
Run the following commands: git clone https://github.com/DependencyTrack/dependency-track, cd dependency-track, mvn clean compile -P clean-exclude-wars -P enhance -P embedded-jetty -DskipTests.
How do I create an SBOM with the research profile for Dependency-Track?
Navigate to the dependency-track directory and run cdxgen -o bom.json -t java --profile research . -p.
What will the resulting BOM file include?
The resulting BOM file would include components with the occurrence and call stack evidence.
